main event: An unidentified object was spotted in the sky near Blind River, Canada, moving at a high rate of speed and exhibiting unusual behavior.
interesting points: The object was described as round and glowing, moving erratically and sometimes appearing to hover.
The object was visible for 2-3 minutes and then moved away rapidly.
The observer reported that birds in the area became agitated when the object appeared.
A bright flash of light was observed in the sky before the object was seen.
The object was estimated to be about 30 feet in diameter.
